alert.note: Alert for Camp; Franklin; Morris; Titus; Upshur; Wood (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 04 at 10:28PM CDT until October 04 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Franklin County in northeastern Texas... Wood County in northeastern Texas... Northwestern Upshur County in northeastern Texas... Western Morris County in northeastern Texas... Titus County in northeastern Texas... Camp County in northeastern Texas... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1026 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Hagansport to near Purley to near Pleasant Grove to near Golden, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mount Pleasant, Gilmer, Mineola, Pittsburg, Winnsboro, Leesburg, Hagansport, Mount Vernon, Quitman, Cason, Cookville, Scroggins, Lake Fork Reservoir, Pleasant Grove, Hainesville, Golden, Rosewood, Wilkerson, Newsome, and Purley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Camp; Franklin; Morris; Titus; Upshur; Wood
